attributes.action: For the Scottish Government to fund and legally protect Scottish wildcats.
attributes.additional_details: I am currently studying the Scottish wildcats and am amazed by the beauty of this amazing animal. I just want to help prevent the awful decline of this animal, with your help too.
attributes.background: The Government to increase funding for us to help the Scottish wildcat, and the many threats that it is under. By increasing funding we can help the many problems such as habitat loss, diseases, hybridisation and killing of them. There should be more severe punishment for killing of this animal

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.  
 
The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:  

https://www.parliament.scot/chamber-and-committees/committees/current-and-previous-committees/session-6-citizen-participation-and-public-petitions-committee
